Package com.tyndalehouse.step.core.utils

Class StringConversionUtils

java.lang.Object
com.tyndalehouse.step.core.utils.StringConversionUtils
public final class StringConversionUtils extends Object
A collection of utility methods enabling us to convert Strings, references one way or another.

    • getStrongLanguageSpecificKey

      public static String getStrongLanguageSpecificKey(String key)
      Strips off strong: if present, to yield Gxxxx - Assumes strong prefix is upperCase, i.e. STRONG:
      Parameters:
      key - key to change
      Returns:
      the key without the prefix

    • getStrongPaddedKey

      public static String getStrongPaddedKey(String key)
      pads the strong number according to its size, to an optional letter followed by 4 digits
      Parameters:
      key - the key to the strong number
      Returns:
      the strong number, padded

    • padPrefixedStrongNumber

      public static String padPrefixedStrongNumber(String strongNumber)
      Parameters:
      strongNumber - a strong number from length 2 (including prefix) to 6.
      Returns:
      the right padded version for it.

      Returns:

    • adaptForTransliterationForIndexing

      public static String adaptForTransliterationForIndexing(String stepTransliteration, boolean isGreek)
      Removes the starting H, if present (for greek transliterations only at present time)
      Parameters:
      stepTransliteration - the transliteration
      isGreek - true if greek
      Returns:
      the transliteration adapted for unaccented texts)

    • adaptTransliterationForQuerying

      public static List<TransliterationOption> adaptTransliterationForQuerying(String stepTransliteration, boolean isGreek)
      Removes the starting H, if present (for greek transliterations only at present time), removes other symbols such as letters with lines or dots, etc. Then runs a set of rules on both transliterations. See TYNSTEP-374 for the rule definitions.
      Parameters:
      stepTransliteration - the transliteration
      isGreek - true if greek
      Returns:
      the transliteration adapted for unaccented texts)

    • multiplyTranslitOptions

      public static List<TransliterationOption> multiplyTranslitOptions(String baseString, List<TransliterationRule> transliterationRules)
      Parameters:
      baseString - a transliteration without any mark-up
      transliterationRules - the rules to apply
      Returns:
      all possible transliterations

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the transliteration of the word given
